content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":17191,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自由都市へ、時々使節で行ってたそうですけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"He apparently went to the Free City occasionally as an envoy."},{"lineNumber":17192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来てたんだ……知らなかった……","translatedEnglishLine":"He came there... I didn't know that..."},{"lineNumber":17193,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んん、見たかもしれないけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I might have seen him, but..."},{"lineNumber":17194,"originalJapaneseLine":"　印象にはなかったな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really remember any particular impression..."},{"lineNumber":17195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「真面目な方だそうですけど。","translatedEnglishLine":"I've heard he is a serious person."},{"lineNumber":17196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　家族サービスも熱心で、","translatedEnglishLine":"He's also very dedicated to spending time with his family,"},{"lineNumber":17197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出張後にはよくそれで休みを申請するって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And he often applies for leave after business trips because of that..."},{"lineNumber":17198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………え？　か、家族サービス！？","translatedEnglishLine":"...Huh? Fa-family time!?"},{"lineNumber":17199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それって奥さんとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You mean his wife and such...?"},{"lineNumber":17200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええ……お子さんも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yeah... and children too..."},{"lineNumber":17201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てことは…………","translatedEnglishLine":"So that means..."},{"lineNumber":17202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　う、うう〜ん……カスミ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"U-uhhh... Kasumi..."},{"lineNumber":17203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、え、わ、私、何かまずいことを……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"E-eh, did I say something bad...?"},{"lineNumber":17204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ううん。ありがと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...No. Thank you..."},{"lineNumber":17205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……カスミ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Um... Kasumi?"},{"lineNumber":17206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「工場長。お疲れ様です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Factory Manager. Thank you for your hard work."},{"lineNumber":17207,"originalJapaneseLine":"　資料の件ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is this about the documents?"},{"lineNumber":17208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ううん。それはいいん、だけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, no, that's fine, but..."},{"lineNumber":17209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Yes?"},{"lineNumber":17210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ええい。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Ugh."},{"lineNumber":17211,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごめんね。プライベートでお節介されるの、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry. You might hate being meddled with in your private life,"},{"lineNumber":17212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　嫌かもしれないけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But..."},{"lineNumber":17213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……見たの。ええと……里中さん？","translatedEnglishLine":"I... saw it. Um, Satonaka-san?"},{"lineNumber":17214,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの人……リーザスに、ご家族がいるって。","translatedEnglishLine":"That person... has a family in Lisas."},{"lineNumber":17215,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奥さんと、子供…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"A wife and children..."},{"lineNumber":17216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah..."},{"lineNumber":17217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に、お節介かも知れないけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"It might really be meddling, but..."},{"lineNumber":17218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カスミ……知ってた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kasumi... did you know?"},{"lineNumber":17219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":17220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知ってたなら……たぶん、止めた方がいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"If you knew... you probably should stop."},{"lineNumber":17221,"originalJapaneseLine":"　知らなかったなら……なおさらだけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you didn't know... then even more so."},{"lineNumber":17222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それ、は…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Th-that's..."},{"lineNumber":17223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たぶん、カスミがつらいよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's probably painful for Kasumi."},{"lineNumber":17224,"originalJapaneseLine":"　報われない……んじゃないかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"It won't be rewarded... I think."},{"lineNumber":17225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":17226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もし、できるなら……","translatedEnglishLine":"If possible..."},{"lineNumber":17227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思い直した、方が…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"You should reconsider..."},{"lineNumber":17228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………すみ、ません……失礼します」","translatedEnglishLine":"...I-I'm sorry... Excuse me."},{"lineNumber":17229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……カスミ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... Kasumi!"},{"lineNumber":17230,"originalJapaneseLine":"カスミは俯いたまま、歩き去ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kasumi kept her head down and walked away."},{"lineNumber":17231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カスミ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kasumi..."},{"lineNumber":17232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てなことがあってから……","translatedEnglishLine":"Since that happened..."},{"lineNumber":17233,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう三日くらい、ひきこもってるみたいなの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems she’s been holed up for about three days now..."},{"lineNumber":17234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「妻子持ちだと？","translatedEnglishLine":"He has a wife and children?"},{"lineNumber":17235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちっ、そんなクズ、知ってれば","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, if I had known such a scum,"},{"lineNumber":17236,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺が頭を叩き割ってやったというのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I would have split his head open myself..."},{"lineNumber":17237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だだだ、だめよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no, you can't!"},{"lineNumber":17238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たぶん、カスミ、好きなんだから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"She probably likes him..."},{"lineNumber":17239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「父親のような年齢だろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"He's about the age of a father."},{"lineNumber":17240,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんかの気の迷いだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's probably some kind of momentary delusion."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市へ、時々使節で行ってたそうですけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He apparently went to the Free City occasionally as an envoy.
He came there... I didn't know that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んん、見たかもしれないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I might have seen him, but...
I don't really remember any particular impression...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真面目な方だそうですけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard he is a serious person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家族サービスも熱心で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's also very dedicated to spending time with his family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出張後にはよくそれで休みを申請するって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And he often applies for leave after business trips because of that...
You mean his wife and such...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、え、わ、私、何かまずいことを……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: E-eh, did I say something bad...?
Factory Manager. Thank you for your hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ううん。それはいいん、だけど……」
ごめんね。プライベートでお節介されるの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry. You might hate being meddled with in your private life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの人……リーザスに、ご家族がいるって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person... has a family in Lisas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に、お節介かも知れないけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might really be meddling, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知ってたなら……たぶん、止めた方がいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you knew... you probably should stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らなかったなら……なおさらだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you didn't know... then even more so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報われない……んじゃないかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't be rewarded... I think.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスミは俯いたまま、歩き去ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kasumi kept her head down and walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう三日くらい、ひきこもってるみたいなの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems she’s been holed up for about three days now...
He has a wife and children?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、そんなクズ、知ってれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, if I had known such a scum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が頭を叩き割ってやったというのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I would have split his head open myself...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、カスミ、好きなんだから……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's about the age of a father.
It's probably some kind of momentary delusion.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
